title: Betrayer-RELOADED
description:
Betrayer

====================================
----- INFO ------------------------------------------------------------------------
====================================

>> Publisher : Irrational Games
>> Release Date  : 03/2014
>> Genre  : Action, Stealth

Description

Betrayer is a first person action adventure game that takes you to the New World at the turn of the 17th century. The year is 1604. You sailed from England expecting to join a struggling colony on the coast of Virginia. Instead, you find only ghosts and mysteries. What catastropheblighted the land and drained it of color and life? 

====================================
----- System Requirements ---------------------------
====================================

Minimum & recommended 

OS: Windows Vista adn up
Processor: 3.0 GHz dual core or better 
Memory: 3 GB RAM 
Graphics: Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with 1GB video RAM or better (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460/AMD Radeon HD 6850) 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Hard Drive: 4 GB available space 
Sound Card: Windows compatible stereo sound card
